title.full: Sword of Rapier -ソード オブ レイピア-
title.reduced: Sword of Rapier -ソード オブ レイピア-

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Rapier master Katharine goes looking for her lost memory. Fly up in the sky  by the chase system.  Soaring, New style Action RPG "Sword of Rapier". This game is the Japanese version with English manual.
